name: webpack-deploy
description: Collection of useful utilities for deploying (not only) Webpack apps

scripts.s3: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp deploy-s3 && ./node_modules/.bin/gulp rollbar-source-map --hash=`ls dist/assets/main-*.js 2>/dev/null | cut -f3 -d'/' | cut -f2 -d'-' | cut -f1 -d'.'`
scripts.deploy: npm run s3 & npm run redis & wait

author: Tomas Ruzicka
